title: 聊天框框里面的<>这个怎么自定义，求大佬解答
author: lijiahaoo

replies.author: 阿有
replies.txt_content:
打开Essentials/config.yml
找到group-formats:
  #  Default: '{WORLDNAME} {DISPLAYNAME}&7:&r {MESSAGE}'
  #  Admins: '{WORLDNAME} &c[{GROUP}]&r {DISPLAYNAME}&7:&c {MESSAGE}'

在这里修改

replies.author: TRely
replies.txt_content:
essentials 的 config.yml
找到chat
然后你就会懂
